definition: anything happening rapidly or in quick successive, precipitate as rain
details:
noun
- anything happening rapidly or in quick successive
= example: anything happening rapidly or in quick successive
= synonyms: pelting
- water falling in drops from vapor condensed in the atmosphere
= synonyms: rainfall
- drops of fresh water that fall as precipitation from clouds
= synonyms: rainwater
verb
- precipitate as rain
= example: precipitate as rain
= synonyms: rain down
